post.author: Admin
post.title: THE PARADIGM PERSISTS
post.content:
Ladies and Gentlemen,
 
 ‘It is more fun to be right than compassionate. Compassion is not a popular virtue as religious people prefer to disapprove of others and tell them what is right with a righteous glow around them. It is difficult to dethrone yourself from the centre of your universe and place someone else there’ said Karen Armstrong during her recent visit to Pakistan. In an interview to TV One she said, ‘Working at compassion and application of your knowledge of God for the benefit of humanity is at the heart of all great religions including Islam. Mohammed [pbuh] was a towering spiritual genius of an immense order and a brilliant political thinker.  [more]
The earliest message of Islam was not about theology but about social uplift of the oppressed and disadvantaged. Islam enjoins Muslims to look after the poor, orphans and widows and dismisses theological speculation about matters you can neither know nor understand.’  ‘It is more fun to be right than compassionate. Compassion is not a popular virtue as religious people prefer to disapprove of others and tell them what is right with a righteous glow around them. It is difficult to dethrone yourself from the centre of your universe and place someone else there’ said Karen Armstrong during her recent visit to Pakistan. In an interview to TV One she said, ‘Working at compassion and application of your knowledge of God for the benefit of humanity is at the heart of all great religions including Islam. Mohammed [pbuh] was a towering spiritual genius of an immense order and a brilliant political thinker. The earliest message of Islam was not about theology but about social uplift of the oppressed and disadvantaged. Islam enjoins Muslims to look after the poor, orphans and widows and dismisses theological speculation about matters you can neither know nor understand.’ 
Talking about interfaith relations she said, ‘Islam had not discontinued the tradition of earlier religions. Jews and Christians developed new insights into their own religion by co-existing with Islam in Muslim Spain and loosing that would be terribly impoverishing. Muslims were perceived to be violent by the crusaders who projected their own violence on to the enemy. It is sad to see hostilities between religious communities in Jerusalem today but there are connections as well. You also see them revering the same prophets and jostling at the same shrines’
 
She said ‘terrible hate crimes have been committed in the aftermath of 9/11 but horror has also galvanized people into thinking and a desire to understand has arisen. People have seen the shame of Guantanamo Bay, the horror of Iraq and the horror of Palestine. They are realizing that it is not a nice religious luxury to remain silent as atrocities are committed. There is a silent majority that needs to link up with like minded people and express its opinion to bring greater harmony between people of different faith’ Karen Armstrong is a voice of reason and sanity. She transcends the boundaries of religion, articulating a vision of bliss and harmony for the future of mankind, said the anchor person. This is true, but we are a sovereign nation and have our own voices of sanitation to follow.
 
According to a news report Qazi Hussain Ahmed has said, ‘We will give full opportunity to the newly elected parliament to fulfill their promises to the nation’, Thank you Qazi Sahib. (This was a courtesy not extended to many elected governments in the past by the Mosque-Military combine, a politician confided to me on the phone on the condition of anonymity). Talking to newsmen at the premiere of her blockbuster film, the renowned superstar, Ms. Kareema Khan, said, ‘First of all I would like to thank Almighty God for the resounding success of my new venture, and secondly I would like to thank Imran Khan for reversing the moral lapse he committed by marrying outside his faith and thus endangering not only his own redemption but that of the entire nation’
 
 While we respect Mohtarma Armstrong for her courage and charisma, when it comes to subject matter and clarity of diction we follow the Revised Writer’s Manual for the Upcoming Crusaders, a brief specimen of which is copied below.
 
‘In the context of the shifting paradigms in an increasingly globalized world it has become more or less imperative to once and for all redefine the limitations of cross-cultural interlocution in order to augment the meta-cognition of the holy crusaders whose initiative in embarking on external as well as internal enterprise is automatically validated when one conceptualizes the contingencies caused by large-scale corrosion of the traditionally followed mores, values and norms as well as the lack of commitment of many imperialist-capitalist nations to furnish an appropriate and credible conceptual framework for moral enrichment and spiritual deliverance of the suffering millions in the developing world perpetually kept mentally impoverished and morally penurious by the relentless and inexorable onslaught of the decadent Occident peddling junk in the name of out of the box cerebration as such and therefore it is deemed essential in order to circumvent the devious maneuvering of the depraved Occident that our first line of defense be predicated on constant, established and proven paradigms justifying an unremitting crusade against non-believers to outshine them militarily as well as morally…’.
 
From Crusading Writers’ Guild
